name: Fever Ball
description:
Spring has sprung and the little Red Ball's hunger for lollipops is big like never before.

Help the little Red Ball to collect lollipops on its way through the cutest levels. You can either go smoothly or you can rush through them! It's up to you! In free fall the little Red Ball accelerates and charges the Fever Mode. Once charged you can destroy evil pink donut spikes in challenging situations. Take on this deliciously sweet adventure with three amazing game modes! So simple, so candy, yet sooo addictive!

Start playing Fever Ball today and get that sweet feeling when your free falling through the sweetest levels in Fever Mode.
